interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Review Date: 2020/08/30
Store: Cherry
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
Review Text: I saw some reviews commenting that the nozzle moves even when the cap is screwed on. This is true, but I personally don’t think that’s a reason not to get this set. I do think it’s worth noting that you’re getting a REALLY nice quality glass bottle in a 2-pack for under $15. Personally, the nozzle moving didn’t bother me at all and I am really pleased with the quality. Love the amber glass, because as the description mentions - this makes it safe to mix up your own concoctions with essential oils and it doesn’t ruin the oils. I make my own cleaning solutions and these have worked like a charm.
Review Title: Solid Value for the Price
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'} This kit is the most basic starter kit for the Red Carpet gel nails. It has everything you need to get started, except for colors. Be sure to purchase a color or colors as well so you have everything you need. The lamp works great and all products arrived in mint condition and worked as described. Color usually stays on for 2 weeks, if you don't pick at your nails.

I previously purchased a larger kit that I liked more than this kit (here): Red Carpet Manicure Pro 45 LED Gel Nail Polish Kit Soak Off Starter Package https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00662Z24A/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_tai_MsVmFbXQFB0CA

The reason I liked it more is because that kit came with more products and the lamp feels sturdier: 1 color, nail files and “erase” tube (what you use to remove the gel nail polish).

However, if you’re on a budget - this kit is probably the way to go. AND you can pick which color or colors you’d like (separately).

Even though at first glance this lamp seemed less nice, it works just as well. My nails were fully cured within 45 seconds. After using it a few times and getting the hang of it, I’m usually able to do all my nails within 20-30 minutes. Easy to do while watching TV or listening to the radio. :) Cost-Effective Starter Kit for At-Home Gel Nails Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'} I saw some reviews commenting that the nozzle moves even when the cap is screwed on. This is true, but I personally don’t think that’s a reason not to get this set. I do think it’s worth noting that you’re getting a REALLY nice quality glass bottle in a 2-pack for under $15. Personally, the nozzle moving didn’t bother me at all and I am really pleased with the quality. Love the amber glass, because as the description mentions - this makes it safe to mix up your own concoctions with essential oils and it doesn’t ruin the oils. I make my own cleaning solutions and these have worked like a charm. Solid Value for the Price
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Care Enthusiast**: Displays a strong interest in at-home nail care, particularly in gel nails and starter kits, reflecting a DIY beauty approach.

- **Budget-Conscious**: Focuses on cost-effective solutions that offer value, as shown by selecting basic kits while prioritizing quality.

- **Versatility in Product Selection**: Enjoys customizable experiences, preferring options that allow for individual color selections and combinations.

- **Functionality and Efficiency**: Values practicality, emphasizing effective products with quick results and ease of use in her routines.

- **Favorable Comparison**: Tends to compare products, favoring those with enhanced features or superior performance, and offers constructive feedback on previous purchases.

- **Positive User Experience**: Maintains an optimistic outlook towards products that meet expectations and deliver on promises, often resulting in high ratings for satisfactory buys.

- **Interest in Eco-Friendly Solutions**: Recently explored refillable glass spray bottles for various practical uses, demonstrating a commitment to sustainable practices while seeking quality in functional items. This reinforces her inclination towards products that are not only effective but also environmentally conscious.

Overall, this user blends practicality, customization, and value-seeking behaviors in beauty and household product preferences, reflecting a holistic and conscientious approach to her routine.
